description: This file defines a class FalTools that provides methods to interact with the Fal AI API for media generation, including text-to-media and image-to-image transformations. It manages API keys, handles queue updates, and integrates with agent or team objects to add generated media artifacts.

classes.name: FalTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with the Fal AI media generation API, supporting text-to-media and image-to-image transformations, with queue update handling and logging.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes FalTools with optional API key, model, and other parameters, setting up tools and environment variables.

methods.name: on_queue_update
methods.description: Handles updates from the Fal API queue, logging new messages and avoiding duplicates.

methods.name: generate_media
methods.description: Generates media (image or video) from a text prompt using the Fal API, and adds the result to the agent or team.

methods.name: image_to_image
methods.description: Transforms an input image based on a text prompt using the Fal AI image-to-image model, and adds the generated image to the agent or team.
